TopicTitle: what is this..? determine orbital perturbation with the sattelit

Articles.Content:
i need help. i have launch a sattelit but i need to, determine orbital perturbation with the sattelit.

And i have noo idea on how to do it or what it is..

thank you..

Welcome aboard!

Orbits don't perturb in stock KSP unless they enter another body's sphere of influence. Is this a contract requirement or something?

Edited September 18, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Fixed typo.
True, but the Kraken can create orbital changes
Is this a stock contract or a mod? Having the specified scientific instruments on board and getting into the specified orbit should complete any contract though.

i need help. i have launch a sattelit but i need to, determine orbital perturbation with the sattelit.

And i have noo idea on how to do it or what it is..

thank you..

Post a screenshot of the contract with all requirements expanded.
Sounds like you're playing RP-0, maybe? That means you need an Orbital Perturbation experiment on the satellite (the Gravioli part from stock KSP).

Thanks for the help it is realism overhaul i am using. Should have mentiond that.

The gravioli made it for me. Thanks a lot.

Thanks for the help it is realism overhaul i am using. Should have mentiond that.
